full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 365 Filed 10/22/21 Page 20 of 40 Juror ID: KNOWLEDGE OF CASE AND PEOPLE This case has been widely reported in the national and local media. There is nothing wrong with having heard something about this case. It is important to answer all of the following questions truthfully and fully. 33-34 Before today, had you read, seen, or heard anything about Ms. Maxwell? Yes No Unsure 33a3 4a. If yes or unsure, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a website, social media). If you heard about Ms. Maxwell from a media source, please identify the media source by name: ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ 34,35 Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence of the crimes charged as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen? Yes No Unsure Not applicable, I have not read/seen/heard about Ms. Maxwell 34a3 5a. If yes or unsure, please summarize your opinion: ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________________________________________ -19- DOJ-OGR-00005296

text_blocks.content: This case has been widely reported in the national and local media. There is nothing wrong with having heard something about this case. It is important to answer all of the following questions truthfully and fully.
33-34 Before today, had you read, seen, or heard anything about Ms. Maxwell? Yes No Unsure

33a3 4a. If yes or unsure, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a website, social media). If you heard about Ms. Maxwell from a media source, please identify the media source by name:

34,35 Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence of the crimes charged as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen? Yes No Unsure Not applicable, I have not read/seen/heard about Ms. Maxwell
34a3 5a. If yes or unsure, please summarize your opinion:
